issue.title: [C++] Fix uninitialized value warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9781](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9781). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The nightly valgrind build show warnings due to unitialized values: <https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/runs/996955686>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9781?focusedCommentId=17180269) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
